text: Giovanni Zucchi (14 August 1931 - 19 January 2021) was an Italian rower. He competed in the 1956, 1960, and the 1964 Summer Olympics, winning bronze in 1960. He won five gold medals at European Rowing Championships. Zucchi was born in Mandello del Lario, Italy. Zucchi died on 19 January 2021, aged 89.Lutto a Mandello: addio al campione di canottaggio Giovanni Zucchi ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Italy Category:Italian rowers
title: Giovanni Zucchi
